website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those who want a good-looking model that combines modern technology with vintage looks.
pros: An attractive model that stands about 3-feet tall and sports colorful neon lighting
Has FM radio, remote, and Bluetooth connectivity
cons: Though the sound is clear, it could be a bit more balanced

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance, good CD & Bluetooth, So-So Radio
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived very well packed and worked right out of the box. Neon-appearance is super neat and the CD works well as does the bluetooth connection. However, radio does not display the channel selected and station tuning is very difficult to use with no manual tuning and spotty scan-tuning. The remote is fussy about working if off center from the unit. All in all, worth the money (but not much more).
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sawrey

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Bigger than I thought would be. Super excited. I'm using it as a special prize at our nursing home St Patrick's party.
customer_reviews.author: Lifetime dieter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply made. Very poor sound & low volume. Already skipped on a brand new cd. "Very disappointed!?"
customer_reviews.author: KC girl

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Horrible CD player. We returned it. Doesn't not display stations. CD player skipped.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Flores

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn't pay attention to all the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Read instructions, works very well. Sound could be louder, lights are very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great jukebox. We love it
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. My whole family loves it. We listen to it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Sound is a bit bright but clear.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I bought it for her. Happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY PIECE OF GARBAGE TO BE POLITE
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter, She has had it a little over a month and the CD stopped working. The worst part is the kid just wanted the CD Player
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Sound and looks
customer_reviews.text: All functions do not work. Some functions only work with the remote control unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product and received in perfect condition as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love the product.. It does have good sound quality and would be a perfect gift for anyone!!! I just wish it was a little bit louder for me but to others that listened to it they thought it was great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Deaver Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No radio tuner display to see what station!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift because I had it on my wishlist. I wish I had read the reviews before I added it to my list. You cannot see what station you're on. There is no manual dial or digital dial, you have to listen to each station and wait until they broadcast who they are. It isn't as retro looking as the other table jukebox I had on my list which I will be buying once in place of this one. The sound was ok. I never tried the CD player or bluetooth. I also could never get a station saved, tried several times. I now have made reading the reviews and descriptions a religion.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelslvr

customer_reviews.title: More of a
customer_reviews.text: Nice jukebox I like that the Lights coincide with the music it has a Remote Control and shipping was fast. This is a gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.author: lady dee

product_meta.title: PPG Retro Desktop Jukebox with Modern Bluetooth, Front-Loading CD Player, FM Radio, 3.5mm Aux-in Jack and Color Shifting LED Lights, Medium 16.5 Inch Tall (Blue)
product_meta.description:
PPG tabletop Jukebox P17-J95BFCL makes you to get a CD Player, a Bluetooth Speaker and a FM Radio all in one. you will be impressed by it’s classic design, stereo sound and color-shifting LED lights.

Accessories:
1. Remote Control (1 x CR 2025 Button Cell Battery Included)
2. AC/DC Adaptor (100~240V AC /5V DC)
3. 3.5mm Aux-in Cable
4. User Manual

Key Features
1. Speaker Power: 2 x 4W
2. Radio Frequency Coverage: FM 87.5~108mHz 3. Power Adaptor Input: AC 100~240V, 50~60Hz
4. Power Adaptor Output: DC 5V, 2A

Packaging Info
1. Unit Size: 16.5”x10”x4.25”
2. Unit Weight: 8.09 lbs
3. Gift Box Dimensions: 7”x12”x18.07”
feature_bullets: Classic style Jukebox with modern Bluetooth wireless music streaming, works with your Bluetooth devices: iPhone, Android smartphone, iPad, Tablet PC and MP3 Player, etc. And also can connects your non-Bluetooth devices via 3.5mm Aux-in Jack.
Front loading CD player for enjoy your favorite music by CDs and CD-R/RW discs.
FM Radio with PLL function for picking up your favorite FM radio stations easily.
Color-changing LED neon lights around Jukebox frame, provide a little bit of tone and atmosphere you want to achieve.
Two built-in 4W stereo speakers generate good sound, and this Jukebox programs up to 20 songs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
